resources.personal_description: You can share your location with anyone's quick, easy and anonymous
resources.group_description:
Create and join groups, to see (and be seen) by other group members on the map. We have not limited number of members.
Group administrator can publish the track, which will be available to all automatically.
resources.together_description: You can combine the usual monitoring, the use of links and exchanges in groups
resources.intro: OsMo uses tens of thousands of people, someone every day, someone in need. Our service allows you to be closer to each other :)
